action_type.Description: type of the action that the subject performed at this event within a trial

Levels.sample: the subject sampled either the left or the right option
Levels.stop: the subject decided to stop sampling the options and instead use the next action for a final choice
Levels.final_choice: the subject chose either the left or the right option as a final choice

action.Description: the concrete action that the subject performed for the action type

Levels.2: the subject decided to stop sampling - for action_type 'stop' only

outcome.Description: the outcome that the subject received for their action

response_time.Description: the time it took the subject to respond after the onset of the event

value.Description: the TTL trigger value (=EEG marker value) associated with an event

Levels.2: display of message that a new trial has started
Levels.3: onset of fixation stimulus during sampling
Levels.7: a masked outcome is shown after sampling
Levels.8: a masked outcome is revealed after sampling
Levels.9: display of a message that a final choice is not possible with zero prior samples
Levels.10: display of a message that a final choice will be performed next
Levels.11: onset of fixation stimulus during final choice
Levels.14: a masked outcome is shown after final choice
Levels.15: a masked outcome is revealed after final choice

mag0.1.Description: the first of two possible magnitudes in outcomes for option 0

mag0.2.Description: the second of two possible magnitudes in outcomes for option 0

mag1.1.Description: the first of two possible magnitudes in outcomes for option 1

mag1.2.Description: the second of two possible magnitudes in outcomes for option 1

prob0.1.Description: the first of two possible probabilities in outcomes for option 0

prob0.2.Description: the second of two possible probabilities in outcomes for option 0

prob1.1.Description: the first of two possible probabilities in outcomes for option 1

prob1.2.Description: the second of two possible probabilities in outcomes for option 1
